item.title: Additional frauds; email sent to McDonald’s General Counsel CCed to McDonald’s CEO
item.description: From: [Victim/key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] (Visit X-v-France.com for more information on who I am.) Subject: additional frauds Date sent: 2015-10-22 11:06 (Beijing time +0800) To: Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com Cc: Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com Ms Santona, Thank you for answering me. Could you please make sure the French team communicate with me by email? Normal mail takes forever for me to receive now that I live in China and I am not going to wait one month to act if there is an ongoing fraud.
